name: Pivotal Moments
description:
Pivotal Moments is a Top-Down Tricky Traversal game about two objects ( A Pivot & A Disc ).  Have fun!

-- Made in 2 days for GMTK Game Jam 2021 for the theme "Joined Together" -

-- Controls --

WASD / Arrows - Move the pivot Q,E / Z,C  -  Rotate the disc around the pivot R - Restrart Level

-- SFX and BGM from freesound.org. --
